metadata.synopsis: Player Characters comment on the ring they just picked up, saying it's inscribed with words in the Kozakuran language - the same language they found a dictionary to earlier.
metadata.how_to_trigger: godgoto -98; 46; 12loot the corpse (book)goto -80; 46; 32attack the skeletonloot the corpse (ring)

2.speaker: Player
2.text: The engravings on the ring match the language on that strange door. I still can't read it, though.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: There's an inscription on the ring. Looks like the same language as that book from earlier.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: There's an inscription on the ring. I don't recognise the language, though.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: The Szarr signet ring. I've never seen it up this close.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: There's even an inscription on here, in the same language as on the ballroom door.  Not that I can read a word of it.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: There's even some chicken scratch inscription on here, in god knows what language. Though I have seen it somewhere before...
